author: al.kc
title: Small SPO Impact Business Programme
description: どうすればSPOが自分の仕事を続けながら、目的に沿った目標を達成するための効果的なビジネスを作ることができるでしょうか。

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal is a great and complex implementation that could improve adoption and usability on cardano blockchain for SPOs and delegators, because SPO business model revenue is a huge pain on Cardano blockchain. The proposal articulates how it will add value to the Cardano ecosystem and for the stakeholders (how to offer SPO businesses a proven 'business in a box' programme that ensures they own commercially sustainable impactful businesses).
As a SPO I think that any Cardano SPOs sees value on this proposal.
At the same time the statement of how problem is to be solved is well being specified with implementation and with revenue model, definition of success that support economic model.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposer team is very well skilled about the whole context and, knows the Cardano community very well because they work as developers and there is a huge experience in business courses (https://www.50thgeneration.org/).
The scope of the solution is well explained (e.g. how the funds will be spent, what business program will be implemented, and so on…).
In my opinion (I'm 20 years experienced senior information manager on financial sectors) the budget requested is coherent with the elapsed.
f6_assessments.q2:
The proposer provides a step-by-step plan for the implementation with clear milestones, with  KPI metrics that are shown. It's good that is that the proposer has briefly mentioned possible difficulties and how to deal with them (e.g. competitors, delay,…) The proposal offers a realistic timetable to complete the work and coherent budget with this challenge.
Furthermore the proposer has very well mentioned possible difficulties and how to deal with them (e.g. difficulties in market adoption, revenue model for cardano ecosystem and SPOs.

f6_assessments.q0: The proposal addresses the problem of SPOs that lack self sustaining business and community. If successful this will ad value by giving more SPOs purpose beyond delegation therefore driving community and creating more delegators. Key metrics are aligned with challenge by creating businesses for SPOs. Proposal is able to scale to address future settings as its focused on the SPOs themselves and not the technology.
f6_assessments.q1: Relevant experience and team is provided with proof of their abilities. Budget seems reasonable and is broken down into identifiable items. I do think that "Curriculum reshaping and programme development" can be broken down as well though. 3 months to complete the program to release to Cardano community seems reasonable. They explain the process they will go through with the SPOs and how they will help them gain certain tools and plans. They have considered risks/challenges and said how they will address them.
f6_assessments.q2: A clear roadmap with milestones was provided. I feel the KPIs that were provided can be broken down into more measurable items. Like tracking SPO growth after they completed your programme. They clearly describe the problem of some SPOs lacking community and purpose and solve this by helping them realizing their place in the eco system and finding their community and purpose.

f6_assessments.q0: Relation to personal qualifications: As a year-long activist in both party-politics and non-party related political (grassroots) groups I know how important decentralised communities are for democratic and economic empowerment, which also applies to decentralized and partially mission-driven stakepools, especially regarding the economic part. This knowledge and my knowledge about mission driven stakepools enables me to provide valuable insights for this challenge. The proposal adresses the problem of small stakepools attrcting enough people to be sustainable, a mechanism that can ultimately lead to centralisation. Helping SPOs to overcome this can be beneficial, however I feel that the proposal could be more concrete and go more into what the programme should cost or whether it's open source etc. The key metrics and goals of the proposal align with the outlined challenge settings. Scalability is also adressed briefly.
f6_assessments.q1:
The proposers are very transparent about themselves and have no trouble showing they are competent and up for the challenge. The proposers know the type and number of team members required to implement the proposal and present them transparently. 
The budget is outlined clearly and broken down into identifiable items and is reasonable to achieve the set goals.
f6_assessments.q2: Well-defined, detailed metrics and an auditable roadmap are presented that define the success of the proposal. A clear, understandable problem description is accompanied by an auditable description of a solution.

f6_assessments.q0:
This proposal does not overlook the fact that SPOs are business units whose characteristics are not far from small businesses that are part of a larger system.  As the proposal describes, small entrepreneurs need guidance in implementing good practices when entering the SPO world.

Small businesses have proven over time to be a vital organism in the functioning of any economy.    And this is not only true in our ecosystem, but today it is more important than ever to keep it in mind.

Therefore, I think the proposal connects with the objectives of the campaign.
f6_assessments.q1:
- Please provide more external information about the team members. Their experience and academic background.
- Please provide more information on the activities outlined in the Budget Allocation section.  Your explanation is very general.
f6_assessments.q2: Very general KPIs.  Please develop KPIs that can be measurement tools.

f6_assessments.q0: The project is well placed within the challenge and clearly addresses a solution to providing new business opportunities and education to small SPOS
f6_assessments.q1: The project has a well documented and strong team behind it. The funds requested appear to be reasonable given the scope of the project and timeframe but it would be nice to have team delivery and curriculum shaping broken into smaller chunks with specifics of size of team, number of hours. It is great to see challenges and risks already addressed with possible solutions.
f6_assessments.q2: The attached roadmap is well laid out and the KPIs listed are well defined with a clear path to audibility

solution: SPO企業に、商業的に持続可能でインパクトのあるビジネスを確実に行うための、実績のある「箱入りビジネス」プログラムを提供する。
experience: インパクト重視の専門家として、技術系スタートアップからグローバル企業や大学まで、高成長のためのコーチング＆メンタリングプログラムを実施しています。
